componentAttributes.description: Find a Job with Employers who are ready to hire!  Our most in-demand Jobs will display first.  Focus on Jobs by wage, location, keyword(s) and other filters, then click "Search Jobs" to see results.   From the results, you can view more details. Click "Submit Application" to submit your resume and see if you are a match. A Team Member will reach out to you with next steps, or you can save the Job and come back to it later.
componentAttributes.doNotAttachResumeLabel: I do not have a Resume
componentAttributes.filterSectionHelpText: Focus on Jobs by wage, location, keyword(s) and other filters, then click "Search Jobs" to see results.
componentAttributes.jobMatchesHeader: These are Jobs that you Match with!
componentAttributes.jobMatchesSubHeader: Jobs match based on the Skills and Hourly Wage selected. Not finding the right match? Go to “My Profile” to update your Skills and/or Hourly Wage.
componentAttributes.jobsSubHeader: Check out the Jobs and view more details, save the Job for later or submit your application
componentAttributes.noFiltersAppliedMessage: Please apply at least one filter
componentAttributes.noResultsMessage: We are sorry but your Search Filter(s) did not return any results.  Please click "Clear Filters" and try again.
componentAttributes.noSavedSearchesMessage: You have not saved any searches. Navigate to the Job Search Tab to look for jobs and save your search parameters.
componentAttributes.otherJobsSubHeader: Find a Job with Employers who are ready to hire!  Our most in-demand Jobs will display first.  Focus on Jobs by wage, location, keyword(s) and other filters, then click "Search Jobs" to see results.   From the results, you can view more details. Click "Submit Application" to submit your resume and see if you are a match. A Team Member will reach out to you with next steps, or you can save the Job and come back to it later.  You can see saved Jobs and applications in the "My Applications" and "My Saved Jobs" Tabs.  (Need help creating your resume? Visit the "Events" Tab and get started by attending one of our Resume Workshops)
componentAttributes.savedSearchListSubheader: Run, View, edit, remove and archive your Saved Job Searches
componentAttributes.searchInputLabel: Search by Job Title, Company, Skills or Job Description
componentAttributes.selectFromComputerLabel: Select a File From Your Computer
componentAttributes.selectFromResumeList: Select a File From Your Resume List
componentAttributes.selectResumeErrorMessage: In order to submit your Application, you must make a selection for the Resume.
componentAttributes.successMessage: We will call you within next 2 business days
componentAttributes.successMessageHeader: Thank You For Your Interest in This Job!
componentAttributes.uploadResumeDescription: Please attach your Resume here.  Cover Letter is optional. If you wish to attach both, please attach Resume and Cover Letter as one file.
